description: EKS clusters must be provisioned within the VPCs created in INFRA-001.
mitigation_plan: Tasks are sequential and handled by the same resource.

description: The Payment service (FIN-001) acts on the 'OrderCreated' event published by the Order Management service (CUS-025).
mitigation_plan: Finalize the 'OrderCreated' event schema at the beginning of Sprint 5 to allow parallel development.
impact_if_delayed: Core payment functionality will be blocked.

description: The Rider Allocation algorithm (SYS-002) is triggered by the 'OrderReadyForPickup' event published when a vendor completes VND-021.
mitigation_plan: Define event schema early. Use a mock event publisher to test the allocation service independently.
impact_if_delayed: Rider dispatch functionality will be blocked.
